title: How to write effective formal emails easily - Quora

response.answer_text: express greetingsRefer the previous email ( if it is necessary)Write your intended message as brief as possible in simple language.Thank the receiverExample: Greetings to you. With reference to your email dated:xxx, I wish to write this mail to you. We are yet to receive your payment for the supply we made last month on :cxxx. Please treat this urgent and send the cheque as soon as possible. Thanks and regards, Xxxxxxxxxx God bless.
